name: Feliboros
description:
Welcome to Feliboros, a puzzle fighter inspired by games like Puyo Puyo.

  • Fight through 5 stages in Adventure Mode against increasingly challenging CPU opponents
  • Play with up to 4 players or CPUs in Versus Mode
  • 6 Playable Characters
  • Pantufa!!!

Made in one month for the Chao Game Jam 2023, be sure to check out the other submissions!

Credits (and Twitter handles):

  • Created by SilviaFox - @SilviaFoxtris
  • Music by Jade TacoSoda - @LinenfelVOX
  • VaDaPEGA - Creator of Pantufa - @VAdePEGA

Playtested  by:

  • Danny - @smelly_t_r_a_sh
  • Cosmic Eternity - @LittlePlanetCD
  • The Weigman

As I'm writing this I was in the process of fixing a last minute bug that broke the entire exported build of the game, on the verge of tears.

That said, if you find any bugs feel free to shoot me a DM on Discord or Twitter, my tag is SilviaFox#8568.

Known Issues
Some devices may experience stutters, this is an issue with shader compilation, should smooth out over time.
